argument.name: location1
argument.description: The first location, specified as an array containing latitude/longitude values, to include in the view calculation.

argument.name: location2
argument.description: The second location, specified as an array containing latitude/longitude values, to include in the view calculation.

argument.name: locationN
argument.description: Optional. Additional location(s), specified as an array containing latitude/longitude values, to include in the view calculation. You can specify as many additional locations as you want.

argument.name: locationArray
argument.description: An array of locations, each specified as an array containing latitude/longitude values, to include in the view calculation.

argument.name: pan
argument.description: Optional. A true/false value. If true, the Map Control will animate, or 'pan', to the new location.

page.description: Adjusts the Map Control's center point and zoom to view multiple latitude/longitude locations.
page.discussion: You can optionally pass in a boolean as the last parameter to specify if you would like the view to be panned (animated) to the new location.
